content.detailedDescription:
While commuting at night i noticed 4 white/pale yellow lights. low enough from changing driving angles to make me first consider there to be a tower or smoke stack i had forgotten. as i got closer i realized the lights were moving toward the i-90 thru-way. i was able to see some structure. it was as if there were two nearly straight flying wings (objects "wings" were only slightly swept back). the tips of the wings had the lights i initially saw and the underside had a dimmer light of the same color. the underside light appeared to be windows like from a wwii bomber. a yb-35 was the closest thing i could think of. i passed nearly underneath with no audible engine noise. as my initial thought of tower would suggest, i would guess they were 1,000ft up and 200-500 ft across. the height is well defined by my changing perspective as well as the speed, which was too high for a normal lighter than air, perhaps at or slower than a landing commercial jet. the two were in a formation that would make it look like a flying rectangle or diamond if not as close as i was. i lost sight because i was past the lights and they were moving off by the time i realized this was strange. very strangely there were no headlights i could see behind me and the closest car ahead was a ways out, but that is likely unrelated. sorry i should have stopped and tried to get a fuzzy cell phone pic. 

the exact cross road from google maps is i-90 between buckley and warner.
the object(s) were moving south south west.
content.summary: Two flying wings crossed over i-90 east of rt 237.

content.detailedDescription: My friend liz and i were driving south on a desolate road south of sisseton sd at exactly 10:19 p.M.Wed. evening when she said "dorene what is that?" when i looked up to the left in the sky id guess 30 miles out traveling south to north was a cluster of the goofiest looking lights i had ever seen.  they were clustered together like one big one then to the right of that big red light was a few small ones then a big bright red one again and it floated erratically across the sky, liz and i were screaming in the car at the excitement of seeing such an odd shaped lighting arrangement when all of a sudden 2 bright white lights shot out the back of the red lighted thing then disappeared.  we watched the cluster of reddish amber looking lights change shape a few times like it was spinning or morphing always changing not like a normal craft, which blinks the same continuously  til it was behind us instead of in the front of us as it turned into a star and stayed stationary a few seconds then we lost sight of it as it just blinked out.  we again started screaming in excitement at what we had just seen.  i have become very interested in ufology in the last few years and believe we are not alone, and what i believe we saw was not of earthly origin.  it felt ..........Strange, surreal because it was not your normal run of the mill airplane.  i also would like to add that at the time it was drifting across the sky south to north one plane flew right by that thing then there were a few more planes in the sky at the same time and usually in south dakota there is never 4 or 5 planes in the sky at one time and i would know i have lived here for 4 years now and watch the skies alot.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving south of sisseton we seen a a cluster of reddish amber lights with two white flashes streaking out the back object was traveling s. to n sometimes the lights would just quit flashing stay red turned into a star.

content.detailedDescription:
My name is david manzi.  please use the following information to look up a sighting report that i made back in 2006.(date submitted: 1/2/2006, date of event: 3/9/2005, state: nevada, couty: lincoln,  short description: close call staking out area 51 in nevada)

when i lived in cedar city, utah, i made frequent trips to area 51, aprox 2 hours to the west.  the information listed above will help you find a sighting report that i made in 2006.  since my sighting of multiple orange orbs in the sky at area 51, i have suffered with many strange ailments over the last 4 years.  i have seen many doctors and have alot of er bills to prove it. i have been through hell with these doctors.  i truly need some advice regarding these issues.  i have procrastined for 4 years because i did not want to accept the possibility that my illnesses may have resulted from the encounters i had that night at area 51.  i am a serious inquirer of help and advice.  this has changed my life, maybe for the worse.  please help.  i need some closure on this.  call me anytime.  the time is now that i face this.  i truly need your help.  sincerely, david john manzi junior (406-593-0553)
                  625 13th st,
                  butte, montana,
                  59701
content.summary: Years of strange illnesses after multiple ufo sightings at area 51

content.detailedDescription: Was standing in my friends front yard , look to the south , seen a yellow star didnt pay it know mind until my friend came outside and seen it , it was moving north fast , we got the rifle out of the truck it has a high power scope , look at it , it had no strobes no light at all , it had a fireball on it ass , wobbled as it flew by ,we watched it heading north until we could no longer see it, i thought i herd a rocket thats why i thought nasa had launch the shuttle but they didnt . to me it kinda look like a icbm flying except for the wobbley flight.This make my third sighting.
content.summary: Watch a fireball move south to north with a wobbley flight ...Thought they had launch the shuttle

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south on rt.9w at dusk when a large ball of light began to desend over the river. it lit the river from bank to bank just south of the tz bridge. it hovered for sometime. the object was a ball of small lights, thousands of them in a circular shape with each light being individually distint. i pulled over and watched as the small lights flew out of the object and circled it and flew off. the speed that they where travelling was unbeilvable. thousands of the small lights speeded in and out from it, some coming in at top speeds also many other where cicluling around the main object. the size of the main craft was about a quarter mile across.After watching the craft for about 20 mins, it slowly lifted into the sky and them in a flash it disapearred at light speed. i also had my mother and a freind with me at the time of this sighting. it was definately not from this planet. i know that other ppl saw this and that the nyack ny police dept as well as the tarrytown ny police recieved tousands of calls to report this sighting. i can't remember the exact date ,but i will never forget it. when i first saw it i thought it was the moon. my feeling at the time was that the earth was being invaded by aleins and that i also knew that i was witnessing proof positive that ufo's are real.
content.summary: a very large lightedobject desened over hudson and small lighted craft flew out of it and many flew in

content.detailedDescription:
I also had shimmering lights through my window which reflected off my lamp and i had that timgling feeling throughout my body (simply amazing!)

not sure if this is human tech or what?
content.summary: Looks like 2 stars moving at the same rate (i immediately thought this was not 2 sattelites in syncronis(spelling?) orbit.

content.detailedDescription:
1/10/10
viewed over pratt, kansas - saturday january 9, 2010 - 8:55pm  :

my date  had pointed out the constellation orion while we were walking up her sidewalk.   we were then looking upwards towards the eastern sky when 3 dim but distinct white lights forming an equilateral triangle flew overhead at high speed on about an 80 degree easterly heading.   no outline of a craft was visible.  the lights each had appearances more like that of illuminated rings rather than being solid, and the intensity of each ring was about that of a medium star that is easily observable.   if there had been street or yard lights nearby, they probably would not have been visible.  i definitely feel that they were all on one craft of some sort as they did not vary in distance or orientation to each other at all.  as for the size, the palm of your hand would have covered them all with your arm extended. the diameter of each ring was approximately 25% of each leg of the triangle.  they had already passed overhead when we spotted them at about 75 degrees above the eastern horizon.  i���d estimate that they traveled 30 to 35 degrees of the sky in 3 to 4 seconds before we lost sight behind the trees and roof.  the wind was calm and we heard absolutely no sound.   this craft had just went out of sight, when we spotted a single ring of light of the same magnitude and speed following a parallel path slightly to the south.  it may have been slightly larger than the other rings.  or lower?  

my initial gut feeling was that these lights were traveling at an altitude in excess of 10,000 feet with a speed in the thousands of miles per hour.  i have no way to know what the actual altitude was, but they did not appear to get smaller or less brilliant as they passed, so that indicates to me that they were of significantly high altitude.  

what appeared to be an airliner was almost directly overhead shortly after the rings and the lights on it were much brighter and the speed was slower by many many times.  the temperature was 12 degrees and the stars were bright and crisp, so even thought they were dim, the rings of light were very distinct and stayed at the same intensity for the brief time they were visible. 

added 1/27/10:  my date read the above and agreed on everything other than she said she thought the rings were visible at least 4 seconds.   i  feel the speed could have been  15 - 20,000 mph if the airliner speed was 600 mph.
content.summary: 3 rings of light accompanied by 1 ring of light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work. headed north on route 3, when i passed exit 17 in braintree. i looked just above the tree line and noticed airplane traffic going to logan airport. i noticed the first plane in the distance, to its left from my perspective i noticed another commercial airline headed in same direction. when my sight dropped down from that plane i noticed closer to me just above the tree line. not sure of exact height maybe 500 feet off the ground. about 2-3 miles distance from me. i saw an oval about the size of my thumbnail at arm���s length. as soon as i noticed it began to vanish. what i mean is, it became translucent and gradually over 30 seconds or less, it dissipated. it never moved or changed in shape as it went from translucent to completely gone. it dissipated like smoke would. i knew it wasn���t smoke however due to its shape and location staying the same. it���s very hard to describe. i didn���t report it sooner due to it took me some time to really think about what i had seen. i don���t know what it was. i have never, ever seen anything like this before.

note: i have researched ufo's all my life. still don���t know if they are real or not. i am somewhat skeptical in nature. although, i am open to the possibility.
content.summary: Oval, smoke in color and behaviour, translucent, odd

content.detailedDescription:
This picture was captured 20 jan 2010, 2:42:55 pm before the rain came. looks like a group of invisible ufos in side by side formation hovering in front of my garden���s sky.

please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: http://ufo-spacelife.Blogspot.Com/
content.summary: Picture of multiple colorful ufos side by side

content.detailedDescription: Ufo sighting
content.summary: Ufi seen

content.detailedDescription:
Driving due west toward the mountains, approaching north hwy 287 in fort collins, i saw a very bright light between 18 to 20 degrees west above the mountains. at first i dismissed this as a planet, as it looked as if it was stationary.  the time was about 6:48am and in fort collins, this is during civil twilight where the sun is 6 degrees or less below the horizon. (sun rise is at 7:08am).  i was about to dismiss this object and turn north to go home, when i had to stop at a red light.  i lined up three points using my bronco, a tree for line of sight, just to make sure that the object was not moving.  i watched it hover for about 10 or 15 seconds, when i noticed that it was indeed moving very slowly. at first, i thought that this was my imagination, but the object started to accelerate, and i knew it was not a planet.  when the light turned green, i did not turn north, but went through the intersection and pulled over as fast as i could. i got out of my bronco, and watched for about 30 seconds.  the object moved about 1/3 the distance it was from the ground in about 4 seconds.  it accelerated very quickly, and then disappeared.  still assuming that this might be a jet that was reflecting the sun light, and possibly approaching my line of sight until it turned, which would look as if it were hovering, and then accelerating, i went home and crunched the numbers. this is what i got:

the altitudes of most commercial jets are about 30,000 feet.  if the object was 18 to 20 degrees from my line of sight, that would make it 16.61 to 18.32 miles away from me.  i went to fort collins airport, and found the visibility for 7:00am, and it was 10 miles.   this indicated that the object was close to double the distance for visibility.  with the sun hitting an object, one might still be able to see it, so i calculated the speed.  it the object moved 1/3 its altitude in 4 seconds, then it would be traveling close to 2400 feet per second, (rounding off). this equates to 1630 mph, which commercial jet cannot do.
my conclusions suggest that unless this was a military craft that was reflecting the sun and traveling directly into my line of sight, (which made it look like it was hovering for over two minuets), and then shot straight up at a climbing rate of 1630 mph,  then it is something unique.  lastly, if the object was indeed moving at a velocity of 1630 mph, and was coming directly at me for over two minutes, then it would have covered a distance of 54 miles, which would have brought the craft over my head in less than 60 seconds, which it did not do.  i would be interested if anyone else saw this object from another direction so i can get better numbers. please email me at bking@rams.Colostate.Edu.
thanks,
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very bright object  hovering, then shot off very quickly.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my daughter home from school. she says to me look daddy, a round plane with bolts! i really did not look because i was driving. when we got home i began asking her questions. it was over a house and slowly moving south she pointed out to me. what is really more bizzare to me is at age 5 i too saw my first ufo. that was the first time my daughter even mentioned or talked about ufo. two days later i asked her to draw me a picture of it. i was so amazed by this. i said draw me another. almost a copy of the first one. i  am so surprised because like i said never before did she ever known about ufo. see my girls pictures attached.
content.summary: Kid says round plane with bolts

content.detailedDescription: On january 22, 2010 @ around 18:35 hrs my friend and i stepped outside as she was leaving to go home. i was on my porch and she went down the steps onto the grass and we were talking and i kept watching her and she was staring at something in the sky. i asked her what she was looking at and she said, "just wondering what the hell that is". i came down the steps and turned to look over the top of my house and this brillant luminous lighted cylinder, almost a sideways bowling pin shape if you will was just floating over the house from the north to the south end of the county. we kept watching it and she remarked how fast it was going that it couldn't be a plane and no noise, to which i replied that there are no blinking lights or wings to it and that it was as if it was floating/gliding, and yes it was that close probably around 4-5000 feet up under the clouds (sky was cloud covered that night)- we watched it until we could no longer see it anymore. if i was to compare it to something at arms length would be an large pink eraser. i told my friend it was probably a ufo as there has been several reports of them in oregon and that i've reported several myself for the county. i felt excited about seeing it and wondered where it might be going -
content.summary: Brillant white cylinder object

content.detailedDescription: While out side smoking i like to look up at the stars. i saw some thing very very out of place! i saw a neon blue/white lite flickering so i watched it to see if it was a plane but it never moved!The lights went out then it started flashing a rang of colors red,orange,and neon yellow that lasted approxmatly 1-2min. it then went dark and the blue/white light came back. i know it wasnt a plane because there was no sound or movement. i have been looking for it for a few weeks some times it stays a red/orange then sometimes its the blue/white.I have been seeing the lights off and on for about a month. the most recent was tonight.It is always in the same spot. which is above the train tracks and/or the james river. i was shocked to see a ufo that close to home.After i finished smoking i went back inside and thought nothing more about it. ufo's and the idea of alien life it not a fary tale god made the whole universe and we are but a small part of it and when the aliens decid to make contact with us i hope they come in peace!!!
content.summary: Glowing blue/white light that changes to a orange red flashing light

content.detailedDescription:
I am contacting you because i saw your program "bucks county flap" about all the sighthings in pennsylvania in 2008. cliff thomas' description exhilerated me because i thought no one could have seen the same type of ufo as i had seen that night. it was very unusual, but he is telling the truth. i know because i saw the same ufo and i saw a secondary ufo that seemed to come from the primary. i contacted the air force as i didn't know who else to inform. nothing happened. but i know what i saw, and i know what cliff thomas saw in bucks county pa.


i was sitting in my driveway looking at the moon through my telescope. it was about 11pm in the summer. i saw something square with a lot of poles coming out from the top of it. it was visible only against the moon. i blinked only for a second in disbelief. then it was gone. a second later i saw a triangle shaped object coming from the location where i had just seen the first object. it flew in a very purposeful smoothe manner right across my telescope. it too was illuminated only against the moon. i reconciled myself to the fact that i had seen a satellite, and a stealth fighter or bomber. but my husband worked on the stealth when he was in the air force. and of all the photos i have seen of stealths, day and night, near and far, at every angle possible, what i saw was not a stealth. as far as the first or primary object i was perplexed. what kind of ufo would have pole like structures coming out of the top of it. that was until i and saw your depiction of cliff thomas' ufo. then i knew what i had seen, and i don't feel crazy, hysterical, or confused, as some people i have told suggested. i feel vindicated! thank you mufon for that program. thank you cliff thomas for being brave enough to say what you saw and render a chilling animated depiction.
content.summary: The first object was square with poles in the top, the second was triangular.

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking ne, over my garden wall, toward and over the organ mountain range, which borders the white sands missile test range, but what i saw cannot be explained by a missile test, and locally whenever they are testing they close down the hwy 70 so that no one is endangered.
specifically, i was letting my dog back in, and saw a series of stationary fireballs that were so bright, i at first wondered if i were about to witness a boloid or other meteoric event. it was bright enough to clearly stand out and be both brighter and larger than sodium vapor streetlights, which were also in my field of view, and at least 10 degrees above the horizon, which would have put it above my view of the mountain range. 

i saw 3 or four flashes like this, the orange color of flame, then it went out. i let the dog back in, and on a whim, because i was curious, i went back outside to see what else i might see. when i went back out, slightly more north, i saw what looked like two fireballs, or stationary jet boosters, side by side, and that object, whatever it was, was stationary like the other fireball looking thing. it let out a smaller set of objects, which were also flaming and curved beneath the larger object, and out of view. i witnessed this twice, then the flare went out.

at this point, i tried to go get my tripod and my video cam, but i couldn't get the settings right to see anything, apparently, on review of the video.

i watched for about another half hour, and just as i was going to call it a night, i saw a series of 7-8, well, fire flares, as if an object was travelling laterally in the sky, and having an engine set on fire. short, very short bursts of flame. the object was just past due north now, headed from the south to the north north west. i did not see it again.

i will allow that, being so close to a military base, it may have been training exercises, but there was no sound, there was no road closure which they do all the time when testing, and nothing showed up today in the local media. i don't know what to think.
content.summary: Flame colored object, multiple sightings, emitting smaller controlled objects

content.detailedDescription:
Driving on highway 75 
thought it was to bright to be a star
star
three white lights one at each end of angle then when plasma looking red light it moved very slowly when it wasnt dead stopped
i was scared....I pulled over with two other ppl and watched it move away
i had to keep driving traffic was going to get bad but after that about 3 miles away i could see it again still moving



helicopters were flying around it and there was more than topeka has...Must have been fort riley's..Somthing was up
content.summary: Saw a bright light thought it was star got closer lookup triabgle over head pulled over it slowly moved away then i couldnt see it anymore till later when i was driving

content.detailedDescription: To start;  we are educated people, previous ufo non-believers and have only told a few people about this.  we were driving home, we lived on a country road which is very dark with no street lights. my husband was driving in his car with the top down and i was behind him in my car.  we approached our home when all of a sudden the entire area was glowing in light.  when i looked up all i could see was large metal panels with what appeared to be huge bolts.  this thing was hovering just above the trees and was so close.  we stopped our cars, stuck our heads out and looked up trying to figure out what it was.  my first thought was it must be a huge plane that was going to crash but it wasn't moving and there was no sound of any motors.  it was so large we couldn't see where it ended because we were directly under it and so close.  we don't remember much else about that night.  i think we were both in shock and our brains just couldn't identify it.  we both don't remember how it went away.  we live close to a nuclear plant so we were wondering if maybe it was attracted to the area.  it bothers me to this day, and i can't stop thinking about it.  i'm only writing to you so i can hopefully find a similar case so i can find people that experienced what we did.
content.summary: My husband and i both saw whatever this was hovering just over the trees above us.

content.detailedDescription:
E-mail from witness:friday morning (1-22-10) while running west bound (heading towards miami) over the bridge from key biscayne at about 6:30 am, i saw if i remember correctly five lights in a "v" shape in the sky.
my first thoughts were that the lights were from one of the tall building from the miami skyline.  the lights were in the "2 o'clock" position.
the lights from the first time i noticed them lasted about two seconds and then slowly faded away into the fog that prevailed that morning not to appear again.
if those lights were from a tall building, i was certain to see those lights again which i did not.  nor did i see any other lights from any other object or objects.
my vantage point at sighting was directly at the zenith of the bridge's height.  lights from the miami skyline would not appear that high in the sky as such.
i heard no sound and the way the lights just slowly drifted off into the fog could not be from an airplane.
it was impossible to discern the size of the object due to the fog occluding any background.
i am a pilot, an electrical engineer with a master's degree and a rational thinker.
what i saw defies any explanation i could ever come up with.
content.summary: Five lights in v formation

content.detailedDescription: I was outside playing with my son on our deck, and noticed a dark shape hovering about a mile south, i went inside to grab one of my cameras and shoot it. however when i went to photograph it i could see it in the view finder but it didn't appear after taking several shots.  soon after that i watched it almost jump over to redwood city, than i went back into my house to grab another camera and was able to take several photos of the object before it vanished.
content.summary: Saw the wierd shape hover over san carlos than quickly moved over redwood city kept the same altitude than quickly dissappered

content.detailedDescription:
Firstly i would like to say i have taken a quite inaccurate date of the sighting.In 2008 i had being on my way to waterford city to spend the night at a mate's house,my father had been driving me to the town which is almost half an hour drive approx from my parents home in kilmeaden.

as we drove alone the main road(n25),around ten minutes or so from our departure,my father had noticed an extremely bright object making it's way over the hills where i could only describe had been coming from the area of ardeenlone heading northwest, as the sun had being setting at the time and this area was a usual route for the rescue helicopter to make it's way to the mountains nearby,my father and i,whom at the time were still sceptical and puzzled at the lack of any sound coming from such a loud aircraft,had put a logical explaination to what we were seeing and said that it must be the helicoptor with the reflection of sun striking from it and at such a low altitude.So we kept driving as normal to our destination.

nearing my friends house by ardkeen just under twenty minutes later,i recieve a call from home, i answered and it was my mother on the other end in a frantic state,saying my younger brother had seen a ufo,now in all honusty some of my family including myself are firm believers in ufo's and are sometimes very gulable to the fact,but never to the state where i recieve a frantic urgent almost upsetting phone call over something seen,except for this circumstance.My brother who is also a very crediable withness who always looks for a logical explaination for event's like this,had been frantic about this happening and could find apsolutely no explaination for it,once i had asked him about what he had seen i was amazed.

he described the object as being the shape of half a cone(from bottom end up),it was completely metallic (which explained the strong reflective shine my father and i had seen as it flew towards the sunset),it had two lights on it,one was a consistant white light at the bottom right and a blue light that flashed in sequence halfway up the side, the craft made a small low frequency buzzing noise, and the craft did not spin or rotate in any direction according to his view, he had also described the scenario to me from where he saw it, his account of it is he had been out the front of the house when he had noticed it in the neighbouring field to the north of our house heading in the same direction we had described before hand, he said it had been so close it had him scared as it was at estimate of five to six hundred feet from him and hovering upward, as he watched the object hover at a slow rate, he then said it moved at an acute angle at incredible speed over the nearby mountainous forestry to the east where it stopped suddenly and hovered downward behind the trees and wasn't seen afterwards. i had went to the forest the next day in hope to find a landing site but could not estimate the area of it's descent and so no finding. this is no hoax, it's a true account i swear to you.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: At first was seen as a bright shine of light that would resemble almost a fireball,until spotted twenty minutes later as a cylinder.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i have watched the sky together for 25 years. before i met her i did amateur astronomy for many years. we like to watch all kinds of celestial phenomena and particularly enjoy watching iss transit because it is so big: quite an impressive sight.  my wife and i were watching the iss transit over our house yesterday about a little after 6:00 pm. the sky was clear and the temp was about 61 degrees. the iss appeared in the north western sky headed to the se. as the iss approached it's maximum elevation an orange red dot with the apparent diameter of the head of a pin held at arms length suddenly appeared. it was in the same part of the sky as iss which had come from the nw and was now falling away toward the se and the object was separated from the station in the sky by about 20 degrees. it was going from south to north. it was about magnitude +1 because although it was bright it was no where near as bright as iss which was about -3. also iss looked golden in color and was really shiny reflecting the sun's light off its solar arrays. this thing was a somewhat less bright orange dot moving at about the about the same apparent speed as iss and not blinking or making noise of any kind. we were thrilled to see what was apparently another spacecraft (which appeared to be) moving in low earth orbit over our house at the same time as the iss. the object moved approximately 15 or 20 degrees through the sky and disappeared. it winked out just like someone turned off a light switch. the whole sighting lasted about 4 seconds if that long. we were both really puzzled. that shouldn't have happened. if the object was in orbit we should have observed it for somewhat longer than 4 seconds. this did happen at sunset which might explain the orange glow of the object. objects in orbit frequently look orange at sunset or sunrise because they are reflecting the colors of the sunset or sunrise from above the atmosphere. it didn't look like pictures of "iridium flares" i have seen either although those are pretty cool and last about as long as this did. still iridium flares, which occur when sunlight reflects off the solar power arrays on orbiting iridium satellites, do not look like orange dots. they appear grow bight then disappear. still i checked the heaven's above website to see if any were  visible from our house at that time. none were scheduled for our area until the next day. we discussed the possibility that it might have been a fireball but fireballs look like fireballs not like a round, orange, something-or-another in orbit. the color was wrong for a fireball too. they are orangy-red or green or occasionally blue. anyway the iss drifted on off to the southeast and faded away as it went into the earth's umbra and we were left there wondering what we saw. one more thing....The iss passed into the umbra going se. what we saw couldn't have disappeared into the umbra because it disappeared when it was almost overhead. if anyone else saw this i would love to know.
content.summary: While watching iss a round object appeared,  went 15 degrees & vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was just looking out my window in broad daylight when i looked up all of a sudden i saw a blackish gray missle object that didn't have any wings except back fins you would see on a fish. the object was very low just above the tree line, and big. could have been something to do with obama's visit here, or a ufo.
content.summary: Saw two objects on the same day this one looks like a missle

content.detailedDescription: Husband saw object in our direction of the building. his coworkers friend also saw it in riverview. could be a ufo, or military craft but the object was silent, and stationary for five minutes as if observing people below. there was a bright white spotlight projecting out of it. we watched it until it left about three minutes later it followed our direction, and then turned to the right moving slowly just above the condo buildings. it was dark outside at this time but i could makeout a boomerang, or a triangle shape craft. i have a picture but it didn't seem to come out real well to dark outside.
content.summary: Had a big white spotlight on it

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were walking home from the nearby woods to my house just at twilight. as i passed a small clearing in the trees to the east i saw two bright stars in my peripheral vision just as i walked passed a tree that obscured the view8 that seemed odd. i stopped my girlfriend and we walked back a few steps so i could see it and point it out, there was a line connecting the two "stars" that started to fade. these were low on the horizon just above a hill. i never noticed any bright stars in that direction, and definitely not two so close together and so intensely bright. within seconds of looking at it, the line of light that was connecting the two 'stars' began to fade, much like when the flash for a camera leaves a bit of a visual imprint in your eyes for a short while after seeing the flash. after that the star on the right side faded in the same manner, the the star on the left side faded shortly after wards. it happened fairly quick, less than a minute i would estimate. we had no idea what it was and continued to walk home. 

a strange thing about it was that it was almost like we had forgotten seeing it and it was hours later while we were at home i suddenly thought about it again. my girlfriend and  i said nothing to each other as to what we both saw, only  something along the lines of "what is that?" - i asked my girlfriend to describe to me what i saw to make sure my eyes weren't playing tricks on me and she described exactly what i recalled and described.   

i have no idea what it was, i live about 35 kilometers from ramstein air force base and see aircraft occasionally in the area, but this was definitely not any sort of plane, jet or aircraft i have ever seen. it made no sound and didn't appear to move other than just fading away in 3 steps. 

i also recall the sky being very clear that night and the moon was near full and already out, but still a bit of light in the sky from the setting sun. 

attached is a photo i took from the exact location of the area where i saw this occur, the photo was taken 25 january 2010 so the trees are much more bare now and not obstructing any view of the sky as it was in the late fall.
content.summary: 2 lights like very bright stars attatched with a line of light

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i saw from our balcony facing east a very bright, round pulsing object, colors fluctuating, slowly moving across the sky until behind tree line. i have 20 minutes of video. we noticed it because it was brighter than anything in the sky with exception to the moon.
content.summary: Bright, round, pulsating light.

content.detailedDescription:
ufo prob/fbi/cia?
                                           27 aug 08
   i was leaving work around 12:25 pm, 27 aug 08, ellington fld, houston, tx-- i was going home to evacuating from hurricane gustav.
   i notice this object, as i was at the top of i-45 over pass going south towards pearland, tx.  i slowed down to get a closer looked at this object- it was suspended 12��� to 14��� above dixie farm rd.  i looked for cables or something that it could be hanging from, but nothing, it was stationary in sky on its own.  i drove under it and kept going.  i looked in my rear view mirror and it was still there, i know, i was not the only one that saw this object. the sky was clear ������blue bird day���, something came over me- (traumatized), i carry a camera with me all the time, which i use with my job.  it���s funny; i never thought about stopping and calling 911 or take a photo of the object. 
   when, i first saw this object, it looked like a surveillance probe; cylinder with dark windows around the top, the object was 4 to 5 feet in length, approx 10 inches in diameter.    the object was stationary in a vertical stance and never moved-no noise- i heard about ufo probes before, when i got home i told my wife about what i had saw.   the sky was so clear it would have made a great clear photo��� i called my brother-n-law and told him what i had seen.   he said he saw something like this on discovery channel... that the fbi and cia...Might have.
   this photo is the area where the probe was seen and the photo of the probe is one that i made on photo-shop to show what i saw.  this is not the original photo were the probe location���and what the probe looked liked. i���m a certificated aircraft inspector and been around aircraft for forty-two years, i have seen two ufo���s in my life time.
content.summary: 5' probe suspended 20'  in air -no movement- no sound -- spy ports around top with dark glass  10" wide.

content.detailedDescription: Saw these yellowish lights to the north of the et highway, i believe east of rachel, nv, disappear.  i, at first, thought  they went behind a hill or peak.  i looked to check if there were any and there were not.  then i noticed a red light come out of them.  cannot recall if there were more than one light.  that red light seemed to fade away as it came out of the brighter one. that went on a couple times and then the brighter one seemed to hover down the road and get brighter then disappeared.  no sound was heard either.   i wish i got the camera out.  i was kind of taken back by this, but this was the highlight of checking out area 51 for the first time. all under clear dark skies and, being an amateur astronomer, i have seen meteors and sateliites go across the sky but nothing like this!!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw the strangest lights ever as i was leaving from rachel , nv near area 51.

content.detailedDescription: The ufo in counter was around 12:46 am on the 9th of january my mom woke up and saw a huge object outside the window it was very close to the window just hovering made no noise and had no lights my mom describes the shape as a boat it had a circular shape on the bottom and a shape of a boat it was silver she says as the color of rain clouds. the object was about 400 feet from the window and she saw it for about 4 to 5 seconds she couldn't take her eyes off of it as she was looking outside she noticed that there was no cars as she was going to call me and my husband to see this object it disappeared some clouds was forming around it an it disappeared.  the strange thing about all this was that i had been dreaming about aliens every single night it might sound crazy but it seemed in my dreams as if i was talking to them.  i told my husband about my strange dreams but never mentioned anything to my mom.  now we do live in the same house so it���s kind of hard to believe that i didn't tell her but i didn't so after a whole week of dreaming about aliens every single day the morning of my mom sighting she came to me and told me of what happened that night and then i told her about my dreams.  it was really strange because i have been dreaming about it and she basically confirmed what i was dreaming about.  now it takes me a lot of guts to actually post this message but i think if there is anything out there it is worth to have as many evidence possible.  even though this has happened to us i am still a skeptic because i didn't see the object i just had dreams so like they say seeing is believing so until i actually see it then i will believe it. my mom is convinced that there is aliens because she has seen it twice in brazil, once in miami which supposedly they placed something in her ear that is what she says and that she saw them and she describes what they look like and here in wisconsin so she is convinced that it is true that there is something out there.  my mom request if possible that you could see if there was any unidentified objects reported here in wisconsin on that date or any radar date because she is convinced that it will show because she says this object was enormous.
content.summary: Circular shape on the bottom but a boat shape body

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting pertains to my mother kathleen ruvane reardon davis who lived at the address in kirkwood in the 1970s.  upon her sighting i directed her to talk to the ufo society in st. louis (wash u. based?).  she did go and pick out the type of spacecraft.  sadly she passed away due to cnacer in 1978.  i have seen ufos several times in this life but i wanted to tell her story.
i was on active duty in the army (vietnam era) so i was not present. i recieved a call from her on or about this date.  mom was frantic about this event.  she was never a believer ever in ufos.  by phone and later by excamining the area she told me the following:

at 6am she always walks her bulldog named ladybug. she lived on geyer rd. just north of woodbine in kirkwood in an apartment on the east side of the road.   she told me she walked out of her sliding door onto the enclosed rear patio to walk her dog in between her apartments.  apartmemnts are about 30 feet apart and the patios back up to each other.  so this area is very secluded in this time of day.  she walked ladybug out of the gate and told me she saw this object scarcely 6-10 feet away, sitting motionless about 4 feet off the ground.  she hinted that she almost walked into it. kay told me it was a grayish color with windows in the front and portals in the sides. it seemed to her to be about 10 feet across and about 20 feet long.  it was silent and never gave off noise.  mom told me she was startled and scared but was also curious.  so she stood watching it for several minutes. finally, fearing that perhaps "they' were maybe going to abduct her or worse than that, ladybug, she backed away from it with ladybug and went inside her apartment.  it left and she never saw it again  

i remember that for the remaining years of her life she always kept a kodiak instant camera next to her bed and carried it with her when she walked ladybug. i have always felt afinity with extrerrials since i was a small chld.  i have my reasons.  i can't help believing that her health condition had something to do with "their" visit.  not for bad, but for good.She was diagnosed with cancer not long after and even went into remission for awhile.  i am certian she knows the truth about the visit now...
content.summary: Small silver cigar shaped/ scout class
